name: Sportcars Traffic Racing
description:
Sportcars Traffic Racing is a milestone in the genre of endless arcade racing. Drive your sportcar through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers!

FEATURES
- Realistic car handling
- Many different cars to choose from
- Detailed locations with traffic
- 2 game modes
- 3 tracks
- Rich types of traffic including trucks, buses and 4x4 SUVs.
- Upgrade your cars in garage. Improve your speed, power & control
- Next Gen Graphic

GAMEPLAY
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down
- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in mode with a counter gives extra score and cash

News and bonuses on official page  https://www.facebook.com/pages/Extreme-Games/1531656503724867
